featured.text: Jane and Sue are twins, but they seem to have nothing .
In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.
Emma and Joe are looking for a live-in babysitter for their three-year-old twins, one who knows how to cook.

Their voyage, down the coastline of northeastern mainland China, through the East China Sea, then down the Taiwan Strait and into the South China Sea, had been smooth until four days ago when the mainsail of their twin-mast sailboat “Kawasaki” was smashed by strong winds on the high seas.
Two days before Valentine’s Day in 2002, Alfred received a 19-year-old heart, marking the first time on record that twin adults each received heart transplants.

definition.zh_def: 雙胞胎，指同時出生的兩個孩子，通常是由同一個受精卵分裂或兩個受精卵同時發育而成。
definition.en_def: A twin is one of two offspring produced in the same pregnancy, typically either from the division of a single fertilized egg or from two separate eggs fertilized at the same time.
definition.example: My sister and I are identical twins.
